New Records: Virat Kohli scored his 49th ODI century and Ravindra Jadeja took career-best figures of 5 for 33
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli batted till the end of the innings, lifting India to an above-par 326 for 5
Ravindra Jadeja bagged career-best figures of 5 for 33 to wreck South Africa's chase
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's eighth successive victory in this World Cup
Delhi's poor air quality could force the ICC to cancel the clash between Bangladesh and Sri Lanka
